==="Twenty percent" time===
==="Twenty percent" time===
â
Every Google engineer is encouraged to spend 20 percent (20%) of their work time on projects that interest them. The time can be allocated to one day a week, or pooled into a month. Some of these end up as Google services, notably [[Adsense]]/[[Adwords]] (which provide the majority of the company's revenue), as well as [[List of Google services and tools#Gmail|Gmail]], [[List of Google services and tools#Google_News|Google News]] and [[List of Google services and tools#Orkut|Orkut]].
+
Every Google engineer is encouraged to spend 20 percent (20%) of their work time on projects that interest them. The time can be allocated to one day a week, or pooled into a month. The outcome of this initiative is now seen as Google services, notably [[Adsense]]/[[Adwords]] (which provide the majority of the company's revenue), as well as [[List of Google services and tools#Gmail|Gmail]], [[List of Google services and tools#Google_News|Google News]] and [[List of Google services and tools#Orkut|Orkut]].
===Googleplex===
===Googleplex===
